lead_paragraph: Ron Philo survived a bogey on the final hole and finished with a three-over-par 75 for a 54-hole total of 216 to win the Met P.G.A. championship at the Wee Burn Country Club in Darien, Conn. The victory was the fifth of the year for Philo, the head pro of the Metropolis Country Club in White Plains, who qualified for the P.G.A. Championship at Medinah earlier this year.
